wikipedia_page.main: Christian Lyte (born 1 March 1989, Manchester) is a Barbadon, English born competitive cyclist, specialising in track sprinting. He is a former member of the British Cycling Olympic Academy.  He is a junior world team sprint champion for the second year running and junior keirin world champion for 2007.
